invocations.description: Returns the distance between positions given or -1 if it's not located on the same floor.
invocations.ex:
auto(1000, 2000)
if getdistancebetween($posx, $posy, $posz, 33333, 44444, 5) > 50 then
	listas('Too far')
else
	listas('Getting closer!')
end
invocations.exDescription: It'll list script name as 'Too far' if the position 33333:44444:5 is more than 50 sqms from you current position, else it'll show 'Getting Closer!'.

invocations.description: Returns the distance between positions given or -1 if it's not located on the same floor.
invocations.ex:
auto(1000, 2000)
if getdistancebetween({$posx, $posy, $posz}, {33333, 44444, 5}) > 50 then
	listas('Too far')
else
	listas('Getting closer!')
end
invocations.exDescription: It'll list script name as 'Too far' if the position 33333:44444:5 is more than 50 sqms from you current position, else it'll show 'Getting Closer!'.

invocations.description: Returns the distance between positions given or -1 if it's not located on the same floor.
invocations.ex:
auto(1000, 2000)
if getdistancebetween({x = $posx, y = $posy, z = $posz}, {x = 33333, y = 44444, z = 5}) > 50 then
	listas('Too far')
else
	listas('Getting closer!')
end
invocations.exDescription: It'll list script name as 'Too far' if the position 33333:44444:5 is more than 50 sqms from you current position, else it'll show 'Getting Closer!'.
